title: Available Joins Schema
description: A definition of available entity types and fields for joining with a custom entity type

sourceField.description: Name of the field from the custom entity type

targetId.description: UUID of the target entity type

targetField.description: Name of the field from the target entity type

availableSourceFields.description: Available fields from the custom entity type that can be used for joining
